content.rendered: Our rafting giveaways start soon! Stay tuned. PLUS if we get 500 Facebook fans and 100 Twitter followers by Oct 31, we’ll give away an EXTRA rafting trip for two  to one of our Fans of Followers. If you’re not getting inside scoop on AVA, you’re missing out. Become a fan on Facebook or follow us on Twitter now!
